products.title: Decor, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pale canvas of the decor in cream features lightly stitched crescent shapes, gently intertwined to form a curious and attractive pattern. The fabric is lightweight yet hardy, ideal for a room and window that get plenty of footfall and use. Lay the cream against matching cream walls in a large, one-colour living room. The walls and blind, paired with similarly toned sofas, wall art, and rugs, will work together to create an airy surrounding, giving the impression of space and light.

products.title: Cypress Pearl Vertical Blind
products.description: Add a glamorous sparkle to your home with the exquisite cypress pearl vertical blind. With a glowing design etched onto a neutral backdrop, this blind is luxuriously balanced. Glam up your life and give your home the star-spangled treatment it deserves. Team up with silk and add a glamorous sparkle to your home with the exquisite cypress pearl vertical blind.

products.description: Radiating warmth and cosy style, this verona blackout almond roller blind is a reliable and practical favourite, with some added simple chic. The richly neutral, organic shade is amazingly versatile, effortless to harmonise with your decor no matter what your style. The shad radiating warmth and cosy style, this verona blackout almond roller blind is a reliable and practical favourite, with some added simple chic.

products.title: Lux Butterscotch Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Pistachio Shell Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a chic, contemporary look, the ecowood deluxe's pistachio shell fine grain features a pale biscuit, grainy textured faux wood, which easily forms wide, adjustable slats built for ease and speed. Matching fixtures are displayed alongside them, including designer ladder ribbons for ultimate style. Build a colourful and vibrant atmosphere in the hallway, placing the pistachio shell fine grain amidst a bold coral feature wall and white walls to compliment.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love rich, biscuity cream tones, then you'll adore the penthouse fine grain from the ecowood deluxe range. Wide slats, with a grain-texture finish, are backed by linen tapes to adjust and tilt the blind, giving a coordinated and designer look. Mix the penthouse fine grain with the lush hues of coffee and chocolate for a classic cookies and cream look. Use this colour scheme to craft and unusual yet striking kitchen look, where cosiness will be the word of the day.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: In true ecowood deluxe style, the range's castle grey fine grain offers true designer chic. With a satin-like feel and authentic-style grain detail, this faux wood blind is as gorgeous as it is practical. Designer ribbons adorn the back for easy adjusting. Pair the soft grey of the castle grey fine grain with the bold and stark tone of a pure ribbon red for an unforgettable look in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Devon Cream Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: For top quality designer vogue, opt for the ecowood deluxe's devon cream fine grain, a thick-slatted venetian blind with a sleek, matt finish and gentle grain detail. Coordinating accessories finish the look, including chic linen ladder tapes that back the blind. For a modern yet classical vibe in a bedroom, sit the devon cream fine grain against a navy blue feature wall. Dress the bed with matching navy bedlinen, in fresh cottons, and adorn with plush, cream chenille cushions.
